channel.title: Help adding the mouse middle button to change camera angle
channel.description:
now that i got this in the right section.
I need help adding the ability to hold down the middle mouse button to drag and change camera angles like using the "arrow keys"
i'm new at adding stuff without having someone help. but id like to know or learn how to add this.
